sentences.translation: 我的“就恰当地被予于了轻视。”

sentences.sentence: I trust you wIll allow me to recompense worthIly the devotIon of your man.
sentences.translation: 噢，我希望您允许我适当地回报一下那个忠诚勇敢的人。

sentences.sentence: Then as my gift, which your true love has worthily purchased, take my daughter.
sentences.translation: 那么，就作为我的礼物，把我的女儿接受下来吧——这也是你的真实爱情应得的报偿。
